mapper.select: SELECT student.id as id, student.name as name, student.age as age, student.time_from as time_from, student.time_to as time_to, student.course as nameCourse, course.description as description FROM student LEFT JOIN course ON student.course=course.name WHERE student.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM course WHERE name IN ( SELECT course FROM student GROUP BY course ORDER BY AVG(age) DESC LIMIT 1 );
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student(name, age, time_from, time_to, course) VALUES (#{name}, #{age}, #{timeFrom}, #{timeTo}, #{course,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.example.spring_boot.mappers.CourseNameTypeHandler})
